pullRequest.title: Bugfix/correlation id performance fix for issue #1681
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is a performance improvement in searching for workflows by correlation id. It adds a method to the ExecutionDAO interface that takes the workflow name so that implementations of ExecutionDAO can use it to join in other tables in order to get a smaller subset of workflows that only contain the ones with that workflow name.
This is a fix for issue #1681.

commit.message: added a performance improvement for doing a search for workflows by correlation id
remove no-longer-needed getWorkflowsByCorrelationId method without workflowName as a parameter
fix tests to use the appropriate workflow name
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/Netflix/conductor into bugfix/correlationId-performance-fix
